title: cant create a clan tag
body: I just cant create a clan tag can anyone help me riot or players i don't care who  just help please  {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey mofolodo,

Clan tag creation has been temporarily disabled due to a bug, but the team is currently working on a fix. There's no ETA at this time, so just hang tight. Sorry about that!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AnHEmOh7-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client
Thank you for clearing that up
